affiliates.relationship: Mercenary contractor working for Nelson Royal

keyMoments.title: Apis Held Captive by 8th Branch
keyMoments.description: The Marine 8th Branch is introduced as the organization holding Apis captive on one of their ships during a storm.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the 8th Branch as antagonists pursuing Apis for Nelson Royal's corrupt purposes.

keyMoments.title: Nelson Royal Commands the 8th Branch
keyMoments.description: Nelson Royal is revealed as the commander of the 8th Branch, ordering his fleet to pursue and recapture Apis.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the leadership and structure of the 8th Branch under corrupt leadership.

keyMoments.title: 8th Branch Fleet Pursues Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The entire 8th Branch fleet engages in pursuit of the Going Merry to recapture Apis, creating the episode's central conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the 8th Branch's military resources and willingness to chase pirates into dangerous waters.

goals: Recapture Apis (Nelson Royal's corrupt personal goal)
Obtain the Sennenryu dragon (Nelson Royal's true objective)
reputation: A corrupt Marine branch in the East Blue led by the greedy and self-serving Nelson Royal. While officially part of the Marine organization, the 8th Branch under Nelson Royal's command pursues personal gain rather than justice, even hiring a mercenary to help capture a young girl.

notableFailures.description: Failed to prevent Apis's escape during a storm
Failed to recapture Apis when the Straw Hats rescued her
Unable to pursue into the Calm Belt due to the danger

alliances.relationship: Part of the larger Marine organization

rivalries.relationship: Antagonistic - pursuing them to recapture Apis

description: The Marine 8th Branch is a regional Marine unit operating in the East Blue, commanded by the corrupt Commodore Nelson Royal. Unlike most Marine branches that uphold justice, the 8th Branch under Nelson Royal's leadership has been corrupted by his personal greed and quest for immortality through the dragon's power. The branch maintains a fleet of warships and employs standard Marine soldiers, though it also employs the mercenary Eric the Whirlwind to do its dirty work. The 8th Branch serves as the primary antagonist organization in the anime-original Warship Island Arc.
trivia: The 8th Branch is entirely anime-original and does not appear in the manga
Nelson Royal's rank of 'Teitoku' (提督) is not an official rank in the canonical Marine hierarchy
The branch's corruption under Nelson Royal contrasts with other East Blue Marine units like those led by more honorable officers
The 8th Branch's pursuit of the Straw Hats marks one of the early instances of the crew being chased by organized Marine forces
